description: The Sally sequence: the length of repetition avoided in A006345.
references: N. S. Hellerstein, personal communication to _N. J. A. Sloane_.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Robert Israel and Hugo van der Sanden, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..50000 (1..1000 from T. D. Noe, 1001..20000 from Robert Israel)
N. J. A. Sloane, Illustration of initial terms
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sally Sequence.
maple: LDS:= proc(L)  local Cands, r, m;  Cands:= {$1..floor(nops(L)/2)};  r:= 0;  for m from 1 while nops(Cands) > 0 do     Cands:= select(c -> L[-m] = L[-c-m], Cands);     if min(Cands) = m then        r:= m;        Cands:= subs(m=NULL,Cands);     fi   od;   rend proc:A:= 1: B:= 0;for n from 2 to 1000 do  a1:= LDS([A,1]);  a2:= LDS([A,2]);  if a1 < a2 then A:= A,1; B:= B, a2 else A:= A,2; B:= B, a1 fi;od:seq(B[i],i=1..1000); # _Robert Israel_, Jun 22 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
